Tangent (Point, Circle)

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw - Line - Tangent (Point, Circle)
Shortcut: L, T, 1
Commands: linetangent | tangent | lt1

Description:

Create tangents from a coordinate to an existing arc, circle or ellipse entity with this tool.

Procedure:

  1. Use the mouse to specify the location of the start point of the line or enter a coordinate in the command line.
  2. Click the entity to which you want to create the tangent. Usually, two tangents are possible. When moving the mouse around, you can see a preview of the tangent that will be created.
